name: Storyteller (itch)
description:
StoryTeller is a small experiment made for the #AdvJam2016

Create your own story choosing between many different events and share it on Twitter with the hashtag #withStoryteller

The story structure has four main stages, and each of them can be replaced with different variations. This way you can create many stories, more than 20.000!

Controls:

Left and Right arrows: Choose between story stages

Up and Down arrows: Choose variations of a stage

S: Share your story on Twitter

Credits:

@celer_gut: music & sound design

@ruben_oluwa: art & design

@Tayx94: code
